import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { register } from './UserFunctions.jsx'; class Register extends Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { name: '', email: '', password: '', year: '', errors: {} } this.onChange = this.onChange.bind(this) this.onSubmit = this.onSubmit.bind(this) } onChange (e) { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } onSubmit (e) { e.preventDefault() const newUser = { name: this.state.name, email: this.state.email, password: this.state.password, year: this.state.year, } register(newUser).then(res => { this.props.history.push(`/login`) }) } render () { return (

Register

) } } export default Register
